CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 8, 1955, pg. 20, reads: "Serenade at Grill - These three lovely ladies are being serenaded at beautiful Crawford Grill Two by violin playing Leon Abbey, whose trio is playing there nightly. This new booth-to-booth innovation is proving extremely popular with patrons. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Leon Abbey playing violin in front of three women, including two wearing striped shirts, in booth at Crawford Grill No. 2
